profile.title: Mombamomba ny Mpampiasa
profile.mustLogin: Tokony hiditra ianao vao afaka mahita ny fikirana.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Asehoy ny hafatra tany am-boalohany sy nadika
profile.noPrivateKey: Tsy misy lakile manokana amin’ity fitaovana ity azo aondrana.
profile.setBackupPassword: Apetraka teny miafina hiarovana ny tahiry:
profile.backupDownloaded: Voatahiry amin’ny endrika voaaro ny tahiry.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Ampidiro ny teny miafina ho an’ity tahiry ity:
profile.importSuccess: Vita ny fanafarana ny lakile manokana amin’ity fitaovana ity.
profile.importFailed: Tsy nahomby ny fanafarana lakile (teny miafina diso na rakitra simba).
profile.keysRotated: Noforonina lakile vaovao ary nalefa ny lakile ho an’ny daholobe.
profile.rotateFailed: Tsy nahomby ny famerenana ny lakile.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Tsy miala amin’ity fitaovana ity mihitsy ny lakile manokana. Aondrao amin’ny endrika voaaro izy mba hahafahanao mamerina azy amin’ny fitaovana hafa.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Alefaso amin’ny laharana na mailaka voamarinao ny antso sy hafatra miditra. Ny antso/hafatra mivoaka dia afaka mampiseho ny laharanao Chatforia.
